Hey HR, I've been following you for a few years because your UL are amazing and, until recently, you included subtitles.  Why the change?  My wife is deaf and most local theatres don't have rear-captioning, so you've been her lifeline to cinema since I found you.  I can get the subtitles from another site and encode your UL via Handbrake, but...

Anyway, you do amazing work - subtitles or not.

re-encoding is not necessary and is a horrible thing to do.  simple add the subs using subler, a 2 min job.

subs were not included because I do not have them, its as simple as that.
...and that's why you rock.  Thanks for the advice!
